create.title: Create Thoughtmark
create.subtitle: Create a new thoughtmark with voice or text

microphone.title: Microphone Permission Required
microphone.message: Thoughtmarks needs microphone access to record voice notes. Please enable it in Settings.

notifications.title: Notification Permission Required
notifications.message: Enable notifications to receive updates when background tasks complete.

bin.title: Which Bin?
bin.message: You have multiple bins. Which one would you like to use?

tag.title: Which Tag?
tag.message: Please specify which tag you'd like to use.

search.title: No Results Found
search.message: No thoughtmarks match your search for "{{query}}". Try different keywords or browse all thoughtmarks.
search.voice: No results found for "{{query}}". Opening search to try again.

navigationFailed.title: Navigation Error
navigationFailed.message: Unable to open the requested screen. Opening dashboard instead.

intentFailed.title: Action Failed
intentFailed.message: Unable to complete the requested action. Please try again.
intentFailed.voice: Sorry, I couldn't complete that action. Please try again in the app.

timeout.title: Request Timed Out
timeout.message: The operation took too long to complete. Please try again.
timeout.voice: The operation timed out. Please try again.

offline.title: Offline
offline.message: This action requires an internet connection. Your request has been queued and will sync when you're back online.
offline.voice: You're offline. Your request has been queued for later.

body.create: Tap to finish creating your thoughtmark
body.record: Tap to complete your voice recording

create.title: Thoughtmark Created
create.body: "{{title}}" has been saved to your thoughtmarks

record.title: Recording Saved
record.body: Your voice note has been transcribed and saved

create.title: Creation Failed
create.body: Unable to create thoughtmark. Tap to retry.

search.title: Search Failed
search.body: Unable to complete search. Tap to retry.

record.title: Recording Failed
record.body: Unable to save voice recording. Tap to retry.

create: Hey Siri, create a thoughtmark called "Meeting Notes"
Hey Siri, create a thoughtmark in Work bin
Hey Siri, create a thoughtmark with tags project and urgent
search: Hey Siri, search thoughtmarks for meeting
Hey Siri, search thoughtmarks in Work bin
Hey Siri, search thoughtmarks with tag project
record: Hey Siri, record a voice note
Hey Siri, record a voice note in Personal bin

bin.label: Bin
bin.description: The bin to organize your thoughtmark

microphone.title: Microphone Access
microphone.message: Thoughtmarks needs microphone access to record voice notes and use voice commands.
microphone.rationale: We need microphone access to capture your voice notes and process Siri commands.

siri.title: Siri & Shortcuts
siri.message: Enable Siri Shortcuts to use voice commands with Thoughtmarks.
siri.rationale: Siri Shortcuts allow you to quickly capture and search thoughtmarks hands-free.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.message: Enable notifications to know when background voice tasks complete.
notifications.rationale: Notifications let us inform you when voice recordings are transcribed and thoughtmarks are created.

fallbacks.retryPrompt: Would you like to try again?

create.label: Create thoughtmark shortcut
create.hint: Double tap to configure Siri phrase for creating thoughtmarks

search.label: Search thoughtmarks shortcut
search.hint: Double tap to configure Siri phrase for searching thoughtmarks

record.label: Voice record shortcut
record.hint: Double tap to configure Siri phrase for voice recording

intent.failed: Voice command failed, please try again

description.failed: Some voice transcriptions failed. Tap retry to attempt again or view details.
description.processing: Voice recordings are being transcribed and converted to thoughtmarks.
